prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon with four arms and a confident smile, perfect for a fighting theme.
I want a Pokemon that showcases strength and agility, with a blue color palette and striking features.
Generate a character that embodies determination and power, featuring a strong bipedal stance and unique traits.
Make a powerful bipedal Pokemon with an impressive physique and an energetic personality.
Imagine a robust fighting Pokemon with a cool demeanor, combining shades of blue and unique arm positions.
Design a Pokemon that represents physical prowess, with a strong presence and eye-catching features.
Show me a fierce and determined Pokemon, with a muscular build and a color scheme of blue and gray.
